title: Urgent Stipend Extension for Family Emergency
description: This scenario involves a PhD student seeking a three-month stipend extension with one month remaining on current funding. The request is driven by an urgent and sensitive personal family emergency (parental illness) that necessitates temporary financial support for the family, requiring the student to contribute. The student aims to explicitly reassure their supervisor of unwavering commitment to their PhD research despite these external challenges.
userTask: I am a phd student and while my stipend will expire in 1 month, I want to write an email to my supervisor to ask for a 3-month extension because my father got ill and I temprarly need more funding to support my family
